title: Lucknow University Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 05 Subject Expert Posts
description: University of Lucknow has declared the official notification fr 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 05 Subject Experts Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., M.Pharm., and Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the Lucknow University Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the given venu...
